original: KIoo, Adolf Henrik, teol. o. fil. kand., prost, kyrkoherde. Västra Tun-hem, f. 10/2/78 i Ryda, Skarab. 1., av hemm:äg. o. kyrkv. Sven Andersson i Kloo o. Johanna Joliansdtr. — Fil. kand. i Upps. 05, teol. kand. 08. Kom-min. i S. Ving 12, kyrkoh. i Västra Tunhem fr. 22. Insp. f. samrealsk. i Trollhättan fr. 34. Skr.: Arvet ej förspill (35), Vart bär det hän? (37), Sök det goda land! (38), Bibliska gestalter (41), Vaka, bed o. strid! (42). LNO 33.
translated: KIoo, Adolf Henrik, theologian and philosopher candidate, provost, vicar. Västra Tunhem, born February 10, 1878 in Ryda, Skaraborg County, son of homeowner and churchwarden Sven Andersson in Kloo and Johanna Joliansdtr. — Philosophy candidate in Uppsala in 1905, theology candidate in 1908. Assistant minister in S. Ving from 1912, parish priest in Västra Tunhem from 1922. Inspector for secondary school in Trollhättan from 1934. Works: Arvet ej förspill (1935), Vart bär det hän? (1937), Sök det goda land! (1938), Bibliska gestalter (1941), Vaka, bed o. strid! (1942). Knight of the Royal Order of the North Star in 1933.

structured.name: Adolf Henrik KIoo
structured.description: Adolf Henrik KIoo was a theologian and philosopher candidate, provost, and vicar.

awards.name: Knight of the Royal Order of the North Star
